App

Class CalendarApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • App.CalendarApp

  • public class CalendarApp
extends java.util.Observable
    The class that contains and can modify current user's list of calendars The observable interface allows other classes to be notified when an activity is at givin time
